Great app, but could do with a few improvements... # 1  - PLEASE give us a location option of NZ only, so we don't have to look thru international listings! We only have the 3 options of international, nth island n sth island at the mo  # 2  -  I love that they've FINALLY added down the bottom "othe...Full ReviewGreat app, but could do with a few improvements... # 1  - PLEASE give us a location option of NZ only, so we don't have to look thru international listings! We only have the 3 options of international, nth island n sth island at the mo  # 2  -  I love that they've FINALLY added down the bottom "other things you may like" into the app instead of just the desktop version, but it often shows you the same items over and over, and if you're searching a seller's full listings all it shows you on "other things.." is more of their stuff rather than other seller's similar items  # 3  -  If you win multiple auctions from 1 seller once the auction closes you can't bundle them together n pay by credit card all at once (only if you choose to add to cart before closing). Also, when you pick postage costs when bidding, once you win you cannot change it. So if you are combining postage you don't have the option to change the prices to suit,  ie: instead of paying full postage on all items full price for 1st item, free/$1 per item after that  # 4  -  If you want to check out a traders feedback, you cannot click on neutral/negative to just select those. You have to scroll thru ALL the feedback looking for a tiny wee face to see what/why they received a neutral or neg review.  Other than the above, I love TM n spend hours searching thru listings and always buy way more than I intended lol, it can be addictive  :D

Redesign Needed It's great to see a native app instead of a wrapped html app, but there is a need for a lot of polish to be added.  The login screen is very poor, the use of real estate has not been thought out well.  There is no transition between activities/views which is just unacceptable for any decent native a...Full ReviewIt's great to see a native app instead of a wrapped html app, but there is a need for a lot of polish to be added.  The login screen is very poor, the use of real estate has not been thought out well.  There is no transition between activities/views which is just unacceptable for any decent native app, OverridePendingTransition() is your friend lead developer.  The button of shame is unforgiveable, please remove it's as simple as using targetSDK.  The actionbar on the splash screen is all wrong, the logo has touch feedback but doesn't do anything.  Search needs to be moved to the actionbar instead of taking up it's own space.  The browse categories page is a little better with the proper placement of search, but why there's an animation in of the search bar with the box looks like someone was just playing and thought it was a good idea.  The kiwi needs the back button to clearly call out up navigation.  On navigating to a selection from categories, there's now a third search option a button at the bottom of the view???  3 disparate implementations of search is just a cognitive speed bump.  Simply sticking to the guidelines will vastly improve this app.
